title: I am a teenager and want to join a music group. How would I go around doing that? - Quora

response.answer_text: Check around your school. Check for teen “open mikes” or hook up with the high school musical. Find other youth groups (church, the Y or check to see where the artsy musical kids hang out. School paper? Stick in an ad and add a website to contact you. What instrument? School bands or clubs? Try busking or just playing in a park, draws people like flies! Some other kids of your level will pipe up, if you’re too good you can make a buck! Check out bulletin boards at music stores or online sites. Gotta go battery’s dying!
